text: Aniket broooo!!! I love you!!! Quiz and exams se pehle tu hi meri aakhri ummeed rehti thi bhai!! We've spent a lot of good times together. Waise ab main electrical core men kaam nahin karne waala. Ab hamaara bhi bharosa uth gaya...LOL!!! Baaki aur kuch bolne ki zaroorat nahin hai. Baat cheet to hoti hi rahegi. Bye and all the best!!!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: Yo Arun!!! I'm happy to have met you and stayed in close touch with you for at least a year. I hope we stay in touch forever. I know that my face or my name keeps popping in your head time and again. So try to message me whenever that happens. We will have a chat!! We've shared so many memories that I don't think I need to say much. All the best for everything!! Bye!!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: Digu broooooo!!!! My life would've been incomplete without you. I don't think I need to say anything. It's all there in our minds. I just wanted to make sure I write this memoir thingy for you. Bye bye!!!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: One of my very good friends jisko main mess men dekhke bohot khush ho jaata tha chaahe jitni bhi tension ho! You are an awesome guy! Main tujhe bohot zyada lecture deta rehta tha...Kabhi kabhi teri help karne ki koshish ki thi (I remember ESC101) ...Wo alag baat hai tumhaari help kabhi ho hi nahin pati thi LOL!!!..Uske alawa we've spent some good times together...like events ground in festivals...etc. Baaki aur kuch yaad nahin aa raha...Bye and All the best!!!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: Yaar tere bina meri life incomplete reh jaati. Thanks for giving the awesome company during the first year....First year men kaafi acche pal guzaare the saath men...phir baad men kuch aur courses men saath men rahe...Uske alawa to zyada baat nahin ho paayi lekin maine tujhe kabhi nahin bhoola ....Aur kabhi bhi nahin bhuloonga...You are awesome bro...All the best for everything!! Take care, bye!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: Piyush bro, kya haal hai?? We have spent some good times together in the first year...Uske baad zyada baat cheet nahin ho paayi although same branch men the, pata nahin kyun...Anyway, Mujhe khushi hai ki main tumse mila apni zindagi men. Every person has a role to play in one's life. You have also played an important role, at least for a year. Thank you for everything! Take care, bye!!
author: Ali  Faraz

text: Vipin Brooooooo....Love you from the bottom of my heart. We have spent some really good times together and I will never forget those moments. I think you are one of the very few persons who can understand whether I am in stress or not....warna meri smile ko dekhkar to sabko yahi lagta tha ki sab chill hai...Aur zyadatar sab chill rehta bhi hai lekin kabhi kabhi dikkat ho jaati hai...Aur un moments men tu mere saath rehta hai and I love you for that!!! Main tere touch men hamesha rahoonga, In-Sha-Allah, isliye zyada kuch likh nahin raha...Okay cool, Take care always, Bye!!!
author: Ali  Faraz
